item.title: Increase the coverage area of Linksys routers by adding new high-gain antennas
item.description:
This is the WRT router four-pack. Linksys, a leading provider of home and business networking solutions and the first company to sell 100 million routers worldwide, has introduced the first dual-band, omni-directional high-gain antennas designed specifically for consumers. These new high-gain antennas from Linksys are sold in two- and four-packs. They enhance Wi-Fi performance by boosting signal strength and throughput, particularly at the edge of a Wi-Fi network. These antennas are compatible with any wireless router equipped with an RP-SMA connection...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/increase-the-coverage-area-of-linksys-routers-by-adding-new-high-gain-antennas/
